item.text:
“To the angel of the church in Ephesus, write the following:

“This is the solemn pronouncement of the one who has a firm grasp on the seven stars in his right hand—the one who walks among the seven golden lampstands:

‘I <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">works</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">as well as</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2873" class="">labor</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5281">steadfast endurance</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you <st data-num="3756 1410">cannot</st> <st data-num="941" class="">tolerate</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2556" class="">evil</st>. You have <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="3895">put to the test</st><n id="3" /> those who <st data-num="3004" class="">refer</st> to <st data-num="1438" class="">themselves</st> as <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st> (<st data-num="2532" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st>), <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> have <st data-num="2147" class="">discovered</st> that <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="5571" class="">false</st>.

I am <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> aware<n id="1" /> that you <st data-num="2192">have</st> <st data-num="5281">persisted steadfastly</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="941" class="">endured much</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">for the sake of</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> have <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2872" class="">grown weary</st>.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> I <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> this <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>: You have <st data-num="863" class="">departed</st><n id="1" /> from <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st>!

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st>, <st data-num="3421" class="">remember</st> <st data-num="4159">from what high state</st><n id="1" /> you have <st data-num="4098" class="">fallen</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3340" class="">repent</st>! Do<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st> you <st data-num="4160" class="">did</st> at the <st data-num="4413">first</st>;<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1487">if</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st>, I will <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2795" class="">remove</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3087" class="">lampstand</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">its</st> <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st>—that is, <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> you do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3340" class="">repent</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> you do <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> going for you:<n id="1" /> You <st data-num="3404" class="">hate</st> what the <st data-num="3531" class="">Nicolaitans</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2041" class="">practice</st><n id="3" />—<st data-num="3739" class="">practices</st> <st data-num="2504">I also</st> <st data-num="3404" class="">hate</st>.
The one who has an ear had better hear what the Spirit says to the churches. To the one who conquers, I will permit him to eat from the tree of life that is in the paradise of God.’

“To the angel of the church in Smyrna write the following:

“This is the solemn pronouncement of the one who is the first and the last, the one who was dead, but came to life:

‘I <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> the <st data-num="2347">distress</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> are suffering<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> your <st data-num="4432" class="">poverty</st> (<st data-num="235" class="">but</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="4145" class="">rich</st>). I <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> know<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="988" class="">slander</st> against you<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> those who <st data-num="3004" class="">call</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">themselves</st> <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> really <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> are a <st data-num="4864" class="">synagogue</st><n id="4" /> of <st data-num="4567" class="">Satan</st>.

Do <st data-num="3367">not</st> be <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid</st> of the <st data-num="3739" class="">things</st> you are <st data-num="3195" class="">about</st> to <st data-num="3958" class="">suffer</st>. The <st data-num="1228" class="">devil</st> is <st data-num="3195" class="">about</st> to have some <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="906" class="">thrown</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="5438" class="">prison</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">so</st> you may be <st data-num="3985" class="">tested</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you will <st data-num="2192" class="">experience</st> <st data-num="2347" class="">suffering</st><n id="3" /> for <st data-num="1176" class="">ten</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st>. <st data-num="1096" class="">Remain</st> <st data-num="4103" class="">faithful</st> <st data-num="891">even to the point of</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I will <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="4735" class="">crown</st> that is <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> itself.<n id="4" />
The one who has an ear had better hear what the Spirit says to the churches. The one who conquers will in no way be harmed by the second death.’

“To the angel of the church in Pergamum write the following:

“This is the solemn pronouncement of the one who has the sharp double-edged sword:

‘I <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3699" class="">where</st> you <st data-num="2730" class="">live</st>—<st data-num="3699" class="">where</st> <st data-num="4567" class="">Satan’s</st> <st data-num="2362" class="">throne</st> is. <st data-num="2532" class="">Yet</st><n id="2" /> you continue to <st data-num="2902" class="">cling</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you have <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="720" class="">denied</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> in <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>,<n id="5" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="1722">in</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> of <st data-num="493" class="">Antipas</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4103" class="">faithful</st> <st data-num="3144" class="">witness</st>,<n id="6" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> was <st data-num="615" class="">killed</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> city<n id="7" /> <st data-num="3699" class="">where</st> <st data-num="4567" class="">Satan</st> <st data-num="2730" class="">lives</st>.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> I <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> a <st data-num="3641">few things</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st>: You <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> some people <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st> who <st data-num="2902" class="">follow</st> the <st data-num="1322" class="">teaching</st> of <st data-num="903" class="">Balaam</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1321" class="">instructed</st> <st data-num="904" class="">Balak</st> to <st data-num="906" class="">put</st> a <st data-num="4625" class="">stumbling block</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">people</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st> so they would <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="1494" class="">food sacrificed to idols</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4203">commit sexual immorality</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="3779">In the same way</st>, there are <st data-num="2532">also</st> some among <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> who <st data-num="2902" class="">follow</st> the <st data-num="1322" class="">teaching</st> of the <st data-num="3531" class="">Nicolaitans</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3340" class="">repent</st>! <st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st>, I will <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> against <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="5036">quickly</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4170">make war</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">against</st> those <st data-num="846" class="">people</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="4501" class="">sword</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4750" class="">mouth</st>.

The one who has an ear had better hear what the Spirit says to the churches. To the one who conquers, I will give him some of the hidden manna, and I will give him a white stone, and on that stone will be written a new name that no one can understand except the one who receives it.’

“To the angel of the church in Thyatira write the following:

“This is the solemn pronouncement of the Son of God, the one who has eyes like a fiery flame and whose feet are like polished bronze:

‘I <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds:</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st>, <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1248" class="">service</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5281" class="">steadfast endurance</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">In fact</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> more <st data-num="2078" class="">recent</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st> are <st data-num="4183">greater</st> than your <st data-num="4413">earlier ones</st>.

<st data-num="235">But</st> I <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> this <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you:</st> You <st data-num="863" class="">tolerate</st> that<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2403" class="">Jezebel</st>,<n id="3" /> who <st data-num="3004" class="">calls</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">herself</st> a <st data-num="4398" class="">prophetess</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> by her <st data-num="1321" class="">teaching</st> <st data-num="4105" class="">deceives</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1699">my</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">servants</st><n id="5" /> to <st data-num="4203">commit sexual immorality</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="1494">food sacrificed to idols</st>.<n id="6" />

I<n id="1" /> have <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="5550" class="">time</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3340" class="">repent</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st><n id="2" /> she is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">willing</st> to <st data-num="3340" class="">repent</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="4202" class="">sexual immorality</st>.

<st data-num="2400" class="">Look</st>! I am <st data-num="906" class="">throwing</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">onto</st> a <st data-num="2825">bed</st> of violent illness,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> those who <st data-num="3431">commit adultery</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">terrible</st> <st data-num="2347" class="">suffering</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1437 3361">unless</st> they <st data-num="3340" class="">repent</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Furthermore</st>, I will <st data-num="615" class="">strike</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">followers</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> a <st data-num="2288">deadly disease</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> then <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">churches</st> will <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> the one who <st data-num="2045" class="">searches</st> <st data-num="3510" class="">minds</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st>. I will <st data-num="1325" class="">repay</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1538">each one</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2596" class="">what</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st> deserve.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> to the <st data-num="3062" class="">rest</st> of you <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2363" class="">Thyatira</st>, <st data-num="3745" class="">all</st> who do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">hold</st> to <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1322" class="">teaching</st><n id="1" /> (<st data-num="3756" class="">who</st> have <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">learned</st> the <st data-num="5613">so</st>-<st data-num="3004" class="">called</st> “<st data-num="901">deep secrets</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="4567">Satan</st>”), <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> I <st data-num="3004" class="">say:</st> I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="906" class="">put</st> any <st data-num="243" class="">additional</st> <st data-num="922" class="">burden</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="4133" class="">However</st>, <st data-num="2902">hold on</st> to <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="891" class="">until</st> I <st data-num="2240" class="">come</st>.
And to the one who conquers and who continues in my deeds until the end, I will give him authority over the nations—

he will rule them with an iron rod,

and like clay jars he will break them to pieces,
just as I have received the right to rule from my Father—and I will give him the morning star.
The one who has an ear had better hear what the Spirit says to the churches.’
